Previous: ścamNext: śnath

√ścut 'drip'

present: [1.] ścótati etc. V.+  

perfect: cuścota  

aorist: [2.] aścutat   -- [3.] acuścutat   -- [5.] aścotīt  

[future: ścotiṣyati  ścotitā  ]

verbal: ścutita B.+  

secondary: intensive: coścut-   -- desiderative: cuścotiṣa-  cuścutiṣa-   -- causative: ścotayati etc.  -ścotayitavaí  

derivatives: -ścut V.+  -ścotana C.  

The forms are often, especially later, written with ścyu, and sometimes with cyu.
